class.name: NoClassDefFoundError
class.javadoc:
Thrown if the Java Virtual Machine or a ClassLoader instance tries to load in the definition of a class (as part of a normal method call or as part of creating a new instance using the new expression) and no definition of the class could be found.

The searched-for class definition existed when the currently executing class was compiled, but the definition can no longer be found. unascribed JDK1.0
Constructs a NoClassDefFoundError with no detail message.
Constructs a NoClassDefFoundError with the specified detail message. s the detail message.
